info.name: Wikipedia Minimal + Paper Sidebar Mod (Lyutria)
info.description: This is a mish-mash of the Wikipedia Minimal and the Paper (sidebar) styles in a very boring hacky way that leads to a very nice look. I really liked minimal, but I felt it needed a Table of Contents sidebar, so I stole one from the Paper sidebar and combined the styles.
info.additionalInfo: Updates: 1.1: Fixed issue with topmost items in sidebar not being clickable if at top of page (the invisible mw-head item covered it). Added transition fade-in to header section. Modified link color. Made superscripts (cite refrences) smaller, less visible. Added custom screenshot. 1.0: Initial version Style butchers the main page of wikipedia (wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page) so the style is only applied to pages matching the regex ".*wikipedia.org/(wiki|w)/((?!Main_Page).)*$", so that it doesn't alter the main page, only searches and readable pages.
